nodes.text: The Liberation was a Venator-class Star Destroyer in service of the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars.

In 20 BBY, High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Marshal Commander CC-2224, nicknamed "Cody," assumed command of the Liberation to search for the recently returned Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Maul, in the Outer Rim Territories. When Jedi Master Judd reported encountering Maul on the planet Moorjhone along with Master Salmara and her Padawan Dray, Kenobi and Cody brought the Liberation to Moorjhone to provide reinforcements in the form of their embarked clone troopers from the 212th Attack Battalion.
